name: Goblin Dagger
description: A small dagger commonly used by goblins. It is lightweight and easy to conceal.
looks: The goblin dagger is a short, curved blade with a wooden handle. It has a rough and worn appearance, showing signs of frequent use.

special_effects.bleed: Has a chance to cause bleeding damage over time.

name: Silver Dagger
description: A small dagger made of silver, perfect for quick and stealthy attacks.
looks: The silver dagger has a slim and lightweight design, with a sharp and finely honed blade. The hilt is wrapped in black leather for a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skills.dagger: Grants a bonus to Dagger skill when wielded.

name: Steel Chestplate
description: A heavy chestplate made of hardened steel.
looks: The steel chestplate is a thick and sturdy piece of armor that covers the entire torso. It has reinforced plates and intricate engravings. The chestplate is polished to a shiny silver finish.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic sword made of iron.
looks: The iron sword has a simple design, with a straight blade and a hilt wrapped in leather.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: A pair of gauntlets made of strong steel, designed to protect the hands and wrists in battle.
looks: The steel gauntlets are made of shiny steel plates that cover the hands and wrists. They have intricate engravings and silver accents.

name: Fire Staff
description: A staff infused with the power of fire, allowing the wielder to cast fire spells with increased potency.
looks: The fire staff is made of polished wood, with intricate carvings of flames along its length. At the top of the staff, a crystal orb glows with flickering flames.

special_weapon_skils.fire_magic: Increases the effectiveness of fire spells when used with this staff.

special_effects.fire_damage_increase: Increases fire damage dealt by the wielder.

name: Steel Plate Armor
description: A heavy and durable suit of armor made from steel plates.
looks: The armor is composed of thick steel plates that cover the entire body. It includes a set of steel gauntlets, boots, and a helmet. The plates are intricately engraved with designs of dragons and other mythical creatures.

name: Adventurer's Sword
description: A versatile sword commonly used by adventurers.
looks: The Adventurer's Sword has a straight, double-edged blade with a slight curve near the point. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword with a sharp blade.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a double-edged edge. The hilt is made of wood and wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skils.sword_mastery: Increases damage and accuracy when using a sword.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sharp and sturdy sword made of steel.
looks: The steel sword has a long and straight blade, with a simple crossguard and a hilt wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

name: Steel Sword
description: A finely crafted sword made from steel.
looks: The steel sword has a straight double-edged blade with a sharp point. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a secure grip.

special_effects.critical_strike: Has a chance to land a critical strike, dealing double damage.

special_weapon_skills.sword_1h: Increases damage and attack speed when using one-handed swords.

name: Giant's Sword
description: A massive sword that can only be wielded by the strongest of warriors.
looks: The Giant's Sword is an enormous weapon, almost as tall as a person. It has a wide, double-edged blade and a hilt long enough for both hands to grasp. The blade is adorned with intricate engravings depicting battles and mythical creatures.

special_weapon_skills.mighty_strike: Allows the wielder to perform a powerful swing that deals increased damage.

name: Sword of the Sun
description: A legendary sword imbued with the power of the sun.
looks: The Sword of the Sun has a gleaming golden blade that radiates a warm, comforting light. The hilt is adorned with intricate engravings depicting the sun in all its glory.

special_weapon_skills.sword_mastery: Grants a bonus to Sword Mastery skill while equipped.

special_effects.sunlight_strike: Has a chance to blind enemies with a powerful beam of sunlight on critical hits.

name: Iron Dagger
description: A small, sharp weapon with an iron blade and a leather-wrapped hilt.
looks: The iron dagger has a slim, double-edged blade with a shallow curve. The hilt is wrapped in worn leather for a better grip.

special_weapon_skills.blade: Grants a bonus to Blade skill when wielding.
